Label.en: So, why did Vermeer paint pictures of an astronomer and a geographer?

Label.en: It's probably because he was proud of his country and all the scientific progress that was taking place
Label.fr: Probablement parce qu'il était fier des progrès scientifiques accomplis dans son pays
